  • Method Details

    • addItem

      void addItem​(java.util.ArrayList<Items> Items)
      Takes an arrayList of Items class objects and adds them to the Items database.
      Parameters:
      Items - An arrayList of Items to be created in the database.

    • checkStock

      int checkStock​(java.lang.Integer id, java.util.ArrayList options)
      Checks stock of an item in the Items database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the item to check the stock of.
      options - The available id's to choose from as specified by the main method.
      Returns:
      Returns the stock of the item with matching id.

    • updateStock

      void updateStock​(java.lang.Integer id, java.lang.Integer stock, java.util.ArrayList options)
      Updates the stock of an item in the items database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the item to update the stock of.
      stock - The new stock to set.
      options - The available id's to choose from as specified by the main method.

    • deleteItem

      void deleteItem​(java.lang.Integer id, java.util.ArrayList options)
      Deletes an item from the items database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the item to delete.
      options - The available id's to choose from as specified by the main method.

    • customerDB

      void customerDB()
      Allows for manipulation of the customer database.
